channel.title: Stuffs i want on my server!you be a ADmin if you help me
channel.description:
I need to add some sstuff to my server but i cant find them in turial..Ok here they are.
Commands to get armor Dark mage Should say if im Online or Offline Amount of XP that given from Train house.(i know how to do bot bot the best one :P) Start Message Make Commands that admin or mod can use.
thoose i want :)
hehe ..[br][size=1]Posted at: November 15, 2006, 01:21:12 PM[/size][hr]Oh and BTW i use Pimpscape :)

item.title: Stuffs i want on my server!you be a ADmin if you help me
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

this is what you need for the online offline thing… go into npchandler.java and search for moo then under the } add this

if (npcs[i].npcType == !!!!YOUR NPC ID HERE!!!!) { if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("!!YOUR NAME HERE!!")){ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner !!YOUR NAME HERE!! is ONLINE"; } else{ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner !!YOUR NAME HERE!! is OFFLINE"; } }

Read full topic
